text:
Message 2018 of 4024
You put me in an impossible position not to screw AD
I could either:
• Do nothing. He misses his last game
• Go by the house anyway to grab shoes
• Let him call to allow us to grab his shoes
Note that
• you said you would get him packed but didn’t
• missed the game time too today, not here
• don’t reply to urgent OFW parenting ask
• called me a motherfucker for trying  to help
Sent:03/09/2024 at 11:30 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: Never)
Subject:Re: RO violation
Message 2019 of 4024
Im asking to stop this shit. Let’s for once work for the kids. Please put them ahead of your need to seek revenge and persecution
Sent:03/09/2024 at 11:34 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/14/2024 at 11:50 PM)
Subject:Re: RO violation
Message 2020 of 4024
Again, can I please forward this instead, and we can discuss it there? As always, their emails contain a bunch of graphics with additional info that
don't come through here. Do you mind?
LOCALHOOPS Training Academy
Congratulations! You've Been Invited!
You have been invited to join our LocalHoops Lions League!
Lions League is our in-house league for athletes looking to continue growing their game without the heavy commitments of AAU.
Please check out the video below for some key differences in AAU vs Lions League
The 3 Levels Of LocalHoops
